Message:
The atmosphere of
the Duchy of Fran resembles
the cabin I’d lived in
with my big sis.

It makes me want to
break down into tears.

But, it’s too soon for that yet.
I’ll save those tears for after
my vengeance is wrought.

Haah... Now’s the time
for concentration.
I need to focus everything on
killing that hunter who’s
finally shown herself!

Ahaha! I can’t believe
my intuition was right!
She actually came here!!

I’d planned to kill her in one blow.
That is, until I saw those eyes of hers.

“I accept everything.”
That was what her eyes said.
It was as though she wanted to die.

I can’t allow that...!
She deserves to feel
much more pain than that...!

There’s no way in hell
I could give her the very thing
she’s beggin’ for!

I can’t let her die...
Not with the same eyes
as my sister...!
